alert.note: Alert for Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 3:25AM MST until January 01 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts up to 20 inches possible. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
